Comments.commentDescription: We have been on a couple of cycling trips beforandthione was probably the best. Tri our guide wasoutstanding and all our fellow cyclists were a great bunch of people. We got areal flavour of life in Vietnam.Lots of interesting food.The meals were good and plentiful. Thought we wouldlose weight but didn't! Good
